mapper.update: update ACOAPP_OMS.Pre_Trade a set a.Feedback_Status = case when #{feedbackStatus} = '4' and nvl(a.feedback_retry_count, 0) < 3 then '0' else #{feedbackStatus} end, a.Feedback_Status_Remark = #{feedbackStatusRemark}, a.Feedback_User = #{feedbackUser}, a.Feedback_Date = #{feedbackDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, a.feedback_retry_count = nvl(a.feedback_retry_count, 0) + 1 where a.trade_id =#{tradeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
